Articles.Content:
The Siliskoyuz is my attempt to make a Soyuz-like craft with only Silisko\'s parts. I did add mechjeb, for orbital rendezvous. It also uses Probodobodyne for the folding panels, but everything else is just Silisko Edition Alpha and standard SE. Tack some landing legs on it, and it\'s a mun lander, too! Here\'s a pic: [http://i.imgur.com/TSEtG.png](http://i.imgur.com/TSEtG.png) Have fun!

EDIT: Please comment and tell me what you think!
My screens must show that it isn\'t a virus, what more do you want? I do realize that it\'s dark, but it shows you the craft and that it\'s not a virus.
It\'s fairly generic, but not a bad design.
Precisely, I designed it as a craft to practice rendezvous, and it ended up being able to fly *really* far. You can modify it easily with docking rings and such, much like the real Soyuz.
